resources.string:
Developer Info: 
 
Sean Cesario: sc65967p@pace.edu 
Prince Paul: pp82735p@pace.edu 
Geetanjali Kanojia: gk72727p@pace.edu 
Cameron Sweeney: cs05178n@pace.edu 
 
Mission Statement: 
 
Our app aims to hold companies responsible and ensure people have a transparent view of how they operate. Users can anonymously rate companies based on various metrics (like environmental sustainability and working conditions) and give a brief synopsis of their experience with them. Then users can look at average ratings and reviews to gain insight into the culture of a company and decide if it's one they wish to work with or support.
